column4: I am getting this error when I try to update my repositories: cdrom:[Ubuntu 8.10 _Gutsy Gibbon_ - Release i388 (20071016)]/dists/gutsy/main/binary-i386/Packages.gz: Please use apt-cdrom to make this CD-ROM recognized by APT. apt-get update cannot be used to add new CD-ROMs. Is it a problem?
there was probably a problem when you installed the drivers
